commands.name: selectControlsCommand
commands.annotation: Selects all keyable controls from the scene.

commands.name: selectVisibleControlsCommand
commands.annotation: Selects all visible controls from the scene.

commands.name: selectAssociatedControlsCommand
commands.annotation: Selects the controls that are in the associated layers.

commands.name: toggleControllerVisibilityCommand
commands.annotation: Toggles the visibility for all animatable nodes.

commands.name: togglePlaybackCommand
commands.annotation: Toggles the playback.

commands.name: togglePlaybackSpeedCommand
commands.annotation: Toggles the playback speed between full, half and quarter.

commands.name: toggleMoveManipModeCommand
commands.annotation: Toggles the move manipulator between World and Object.

commands.name: toggleRotateManipModeCommand
commands.annotation: Toggles the rotate manipulator between World, Object and Gimbal.

commands.name: toggleViewportCommand
commands.annotation: Toggles the viewport without the hotbox.

commands.name: frameVisibleCommand
commands.annotation: Frames the camera to all visible objects.

commands.name: keySelectedAttributesCommand
commands.annotation: Keys the selected channel-box attributes, if no attributes are selected then all attributes are keyed instead.

commands.name: keyTransformAttributesCommand
commands.annotation: Keys the translate, rotate and scale attributes on the selected nodes.

commands.name: resetTransformsCommand
commands.annotation: Resets the transforms on the selected objects.

commands.name: deleteSelectedKeysCommand
commands.annotation: Deletes any selected keys inside the time slider.

commands.name: deleteSelectedAnimationCommand
commands.annotation: Deletes all animation from the selected objects.

commands.name: deleteSingleTranslateKeyCommand
commands.annotation: Deletes any translate keys at the current time.

commands.name: deleteSingleRotateKeyCommand
commands.annotation: Deletes any rotate keys at the current time.

commands.name: deleteSingleScaleKeyCommand
commands.annotation: Deletes any scale keys at the current time.

commands.name: deleteOverlappingKeysCommand
commands.annotation: Deletes any overlapping keys from the active selection.

commands.name: goToNextFrameCommand
commands.annotation: Goes to the next frame with undo disabled.

commands.name: goToPreviousFrameCommand
commands.annotation: Goes to the previous frame with undo disabled.

commands.name: goToNextKeyframeCommand
commands.annotation: Goes to the next keyframe with undo disabled.

commands.name: goToPreviousKeyframeCommand
commands.annotation: Goes to the previous keyframe with undo disabled.

commands.name: goToStartFrameCommand
commands.annotation: Interrupts playback and goes to the start frame.

commands.name: goToEndFrameCommand
commands.annotation: Interrupts playback and goes to the end frame.

commands.name: toggleWireframeCommand
commands.annotation: Toggles between wireframe and shaded.

commands.name: toggleWireframeOnShadedCommand
commands.annotation: Toggles between wireframe on shaded.
